interpretation:
Opener:	 has 13-21 points and 3+ clubs.
	Denies 5 card major
	Denies balanced hand
Responder:	 has 6-12 points
	Denies support for opener's suit
	Denies 4 card major
	Has 4+ diamonds

hints.hint0:
To show new major requires 4 cards, 5 for minor
Bid only valid in competition
hints.hint1:
Small=13-15, Medium=16-18, Large=19-21
Look for new suit or 6+ in opening suit
